APP_DESCRIPTION: A rapid web application development boilerplate built on NestJS, HTMX, Tailwind, DaisyUI, MikroORM, and more.
TAGLINE: Ship faster with a proven full-stack boilerplate
HERO_DESCRIPTION: A decade of engineering experience distilled into an opinionated, production-ready starting point for modern web apps. Built on NestJS, HTMX, Tailwind, DaisyUI, MikroORM, and more.
FEATURE_AUTH_DESC: Multi-user support with JWT-based auth, password management, and account reset flows out of the box.
FEATURE_PWA_DESC: Service worker, offline support, cross-platform install prompt, and Web Push Notifications via Workbox.
FEATURE_ORM_DESC: SQLite by default, switchable to PostgreSQL. Full migration support via the MikroORM CLI.
FEATURE_FILE_DESC: Configurable local disk or S3-compatible object storage. Swap with a single environment variable.
FEATURE_HTMX_DESC: Dynamic server-driven UI without a heavy frontend framework. SSR templates via Handlebars MVC.
FEATURE_I18N_DESC: nestjs-i18n built in with type-safe translation keys and easy-to-extend locale files.
FEATURE_DOCKER_DESC: Included Dockerfile and Docker Compose for one-command local development and production deployment.
FEATURE_LIGHTHOUSE_DESC: Starts with perfect scores across Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO.
SELF_HOST_DESC: Run locally or deploy to any VPS with Docker. Swap SQLite for PostgreSQL and local storage for S3 as you scale.
SELF_HOST_NOTE: Defaults to SQLite + local file storage. No external services required.
